title: 风暴王国 | Kingdom of Galekin - 1.5
author: orangesc

replies.author: 夜刀神十香
replies.txt_content:
标题: 风暴王国 | Kingdom of Galekin - 1.5 本帖最后由 夜刀神十香 于 2018-8-18 13:24 编辑 


风暴王国 | Kingdom of Galekin
 [ 地图简介 | Map Info ]
该创作地图名称为“Kingdom of Galekin”，是玩家Linard独自一人用了5年半打造而成
是一个带有中古世纪风格的奇幻国度。

作者也从没有停止对“Kingdom of Galekin”的更新，到目前为止作者已经更新了多个版本
地图也在不断的扩大。

地图有多个岛屿，与其说是一个地图不如说是一个中世纪奇幻世界。非常适合探索！

更新日志：
Update #45 : 10 months agoOct 23, 2017Yo People!




I've finished the new update for you guys and because a lot of people asked for it I included a download link too.




https://imgur.com/gallery/YGz7L

Check the album for more pictures.




The new update includes plenty more locations like: Nordic Village, Pirate Bay,Volcanos, Sjors Castle, The new version of North Whitecliff, Castle Barracks, Farms etc..




Check the server if you want to, we got plenty more adventure for you :)





Update #44 : 2 years agoFeb 13, 2017Hey Everyone!

Kingdom of Galekin 1.4 is finally here and I must say this is the biggest update so far. We've worked hard on making the Official Kingdom of Galekin Server as a lot of people asked for it and it's finally done, you can check it out now with mc version 1.11. The server's going to be constantly updated with new quests,build etc. Also the map got an update too, mainly focused on whitecliff, there's a new area (Whitecliff Industrial Area) with a big factory, quests and boss fight. There're 2 arenas for pvp and spleef for people who want to play it, also 10+ detailed buildings in South Whitecliff and a barracks for the big castle(download soon). North Whitecliff got some new builds too and made some terraforming all around the map. New Spawn was built too for new players. I had to remove the download link because a lot of people want to use it on their server and it can't work for us, I hope you can understand my decision, but you can always check out the map on our server and there's gon be a seperated creative server for people who only want to check out the map and maybe build some plots that can be copied into the main server. Thank you for all the support so far and new updates coming soon :) Have a nice day!




Update #43 : 2 years agoOct 2, 20161.3 is finally done :)

I've build a massive city south of Whitecliff with a big castle,cathedral,docks,lots of houses and a lot more :) check that out, download link is updated too. Also new minecraft videos coming soon with updates and the cinematic is already done, check the front page :)




Update #42 : 4 years agoNov 5, 20141.2 is here finally with all the things completed, fixed a lot of stuff, added big mountains, big houses, new areas,lot of little details.All the interiors are completed, if you found something wrong with it tell me in the comments :)




Update #41 : 4 years agoAug 6, 2014new update is done, with new pictures and download link


redone a lot of things,fixed old locations and added some more detail,I've made a lot of interiors also


thanks to jackjt8 again for the pics




Update #40 : 4 years agoMay 15, 2014new update is here with a new download link, I've made a lot of changes and started rebuilding a lot of areas.
new renders added, made by reddit user jackjt8 and new overview of the map too.




Update #39 : 4 years agoMar 6, 2014fixed the pigspawning glitch and a couple bugs with the map, now you can play it smooth, also I've edited the city adis and the castle with a harbor and a big ship




Update #38 : 5 years agoJan 14, 2014hey everybody! There was some issues with the map so not all of the interior's are done but I decided that I want to put a download link here for those who want an update and don't like waiting. All of the buildings are done and a lot of the interior's too. There's a big city with 4 big parts, big farm, castle,docks,villages etc.
there's a new overview too
there'll be a completed update in the future but I need to solve these problems I had in SP
download link is now on dropbox




Update #37 : 5 years agoNov 18, 2013added new picture about the city harbor
the city is completed except the interiors, so couple weeks and you can enjoy the new, biggest update so far with the most details and biggest city on the map

also new overview




Update #36 : 5 years agoNov 3, 2013updated the details and added some important notes to the builders and everyone




Update #35 : 5 years agoOct 17, 2013new featured image

Update #33 : 5 years agoOct 9, 2013new picture about the 2 new villages, soon the city is going to be finished




Update #32 : 5 years agoOct 7, 2013new picture about the spawn, it connects the villages and cities




Update #31 : 5 years agoSep 17, 2013new update is done, I've made another village next to the big city Whitecliff
the coords are this: -1235, 72, -561
new render picture about the new village Blueborough
also I've imported my old village to the world, Northwald, you can find it here: 1653,77,-1061
there's a big road in the map, you can visit each location from there, it comes from the spawn and the dwarven city, it's very long but it's easier now to find everything




Update #30 : 5 years agoSep 16, 2013new render images, replaced the old ones with 1920x1200 images and without missing parts.




Update #29 : 5 years agoSep 10, 2013new update is done with download link, there's a new big village with a lot of houses and detail, replaced the spawn too so you can find the locations easy and made a lot of other things like terraforming,details in other cities,building, and also new renders

enjoy




Update #28 : 5 years agoSep 1, 2013I'm working on the village next to the city, it's almost finished
imgur album
download coming soon

RENDERS




Update #25 : 5 years agoJun 24, 2013Hi everyone!
It was a long time I haven't updated this map but today I need to because I can't continue for a long time, it's not 1.1, it's a half update but that not mean that Its just couple houses and that's it, I've made a lot of stuff like a big river and ocean to the new area where you can find a big city with some villages around it and big farm,ships,castle, detailed houses,dock,statues, barracks, markets and a lot more stuff with a big wall around it. You can download it of course and you can view the picture I've made with CartographG. The texture pack I'm using is Conquest texture pack but of course you can use all txt packs. I hope you'll like it, this is my best project so far on the map

-enjoy
dancsa222/Linard

[ 地图下载 | Map download ]地图作者：Linard
原发布帖：https://www.planetminecraft.com/ ... of-galekin-1803290/
原帖下载地址：http://www.mediafire.com/file/0r ... +of+Galekin+1.5.zip
地图授权：




[ 地图安装 | The Installation ]Save存档(正版用户):关闭Minecraft，在Windows开始菜单的搜索框中输入%appdata%/.minecraft，然后按下Enter（回车）按键。把从百度网盘下载回来的地图存档解压缩放到.minecraft\saves文件夹里面。Schematics存档：这类型需要MCEdit。下载完成后解压到桌面，关闭Minecraft，双击mcedit.exe，点击下方import按钮，打开你下载的文件到你需要放的地方，最后点import，按Ctrl+s保存，Ctrl+w关掉存档，点Quit退出。

[ 使用条款 | Terms of Use ]1、未经原作者的明确书面许可，任何人不得复制转载摘编使用原帖内容或本人转载内容进行商业和专业使用。
2、不能暗示此地图为您的个人作品，更不要将此地图作为您的作品再次发布！
3、您可以在原作者知情下将此地图用于您的服务器。
4、如若本贴的内容有侵犯您的版权，请联系我，在我确认属实后，会删除所有内容。
5、本转载贴纯属个人行为，只代表个人立场及观点，与MCBBS网站官方立场无关。
6、本帖最终解释权归本人所有，作品最终解释权归原作者所有。

[ 最后的话  The Others ]如果你喜欢这个地图，记得去官网给予其钻石、回复或订阅；
另外强烈建议海外玩家前往官网下载地址下载本地图，这也是对作者的一种支持。
若发现下载地址异常、存档损坏等问题，麻烦在下方留言告知。
如果你要载入这地图到服务器或拍视频，请记得填上作者名字及官网，感激不尽。
